		"ScriptBind_ProtectedBinds.h"
		"Environment/MineField.h"
		"Environment/SmartMine.h"
		"GameActions.actions"
)

add_sources("CryGameSDKDLL_uber_8.cpp"
	PROJECTS CryGameSDK
	SOURCE_GROUP "Game Files\\\\Environment"
		"Environment/LedgeManager.cpp"

	PROJECTS CryGameSDK

	PROJECTS CryGameSDK
	SOURCE_GROUP "Boids"
		"Boids/BirdsFlock.cpp"
		"Boids/BoidBird.cpp"

		"Boids/BoidFish.h"
		"Boids/BoidObject.h"

		"Boids/ChickenBoids.h"
		"Boids/FishFlock.h"
		"Boids/Flock.h"

		"Boids/ScriptBind_Boids.h"
	SOURCE_GROUP "Root"
		"StdAfx.cpp"
)

end_sources()
#END-FILE-LIST

add_subdirectory(${CRYENGINE_DIR}/Code/CryPlugins/CryLobby "${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/CryLobby")

CryGameModule(CryGameSDK PCH "StdAfx.cpp" SOLUTION_FOLDER "Projects/GameSDK")

target_include_directories( ${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE "${CRYENGINE_DIR}/Code/CryEngine/CryAction" )

target_link_libraries( ${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE CryLobby )
target_link_libraries( ${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE CryPerceptionSystem )

if (WIN32 OR WIN64)
	target_link_libraries( ${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE shell32 Gdi32  )
elseif(ORBIS)
	deploy_runtime_dir(../Resources/orbis/sce_sys app/sce_sys)
elseif(DURANGO)
	target_compile_options( ${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE /EHsc /ZW )
	target_link_libraries( ${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE etwplus ixmlhttprequest2 Ws2_32 uuid )
	configure_durango_game(
		"app_id" "GameSDK.app"
		"package_name" "GameSDK"
		"display_name" "GameSDK Development"
		"publisher_name" "Crytek"
		"description" "CRYENGINE SDK"
		"foreground_text" "light"
		"background_color" "#6495ED"
		"version" "1.0.0.0"
		"titleid" "06BFF3BF"
		"scid" "84d70100-5e91-4cf0-bcc9-7b2f06bff3bf"
		"appxmanifest" "AppxManifest.xml"
		"logo" "DurangoLogo.png"
		"small_logo" "DurangoSmallLogo.png"
		"wide_logo" "DurangoWideLogo.png"
		"splash_screen" "DurangoSplashScreen.png"
		"store_logo" "DurangoStoreLogo.png"
	)
elseif(ANDROID)
	target_link_libraries(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE CryAction)
endif()
